name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Nothing is unforgivable. So if you cannot forgive him, it means you do not want to.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote:
People... humans are the being who look for happiness. What the Britannian boy, Lelouch, wanted to have was nothing but a small happiness. It's nothing special. At least at the root of his motives, there were only humble wishes that were simply natural to any human. Who could ever disclaim such dreams and such vows? Who could ever have the right to do that? However, whoever you might be, without choice, you have to deal with others and with the world, and have yourself be regulated and set down. Therefore, in the face of the world's wills, your personal speculations are so ephemeral they can't help being overwhelmed. Sins and punishments, destiny and judgment. What stands in front of Lelouch is the past he brought forth by himself. Is it a hatred resulting from the fact that humans are humans? Nonetheless, for now, we should be grateful... Yes, at least, to the fact that humans are the beings who look for happiness. 
A remaining piece of hope, a faint sign of wishes will be born from despairs.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Only fools wage war.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: When will the war end? When someone wins.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The best way to remove your lies is to make them come true.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I must spill yet more blood, so the blood already split will not be in vain.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: All men are NOT created equal! Some are born smarter, or more beautiful, or with parents of greater status. Some, by contrast, are born of weak body or mind, or with few, if any, talents. All men are different! Yes, the very existence of man is discriminatory! That's why there is war, violence and unrest.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You will never be able to love anybody else until you love your self...

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I think being able to openly take away the most important thing people have... "life"... is the best thing that ever happened!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: A victory won through dishonesty means it's no victory at all.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Why don't you understand? Nunnally was blinded! My own sister was crippled! She knew... she knew that there were things in this world that she will never be able to do by herself! So her smile... Nunnally's smile... was her way of expressing gratitude!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Before creation there must be destruction. If my soul stands in the way, then I'll toss it aside. Yes, I have no choice but to move forward.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The world is destined for even greater chaos.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Time flows constantly, it doesn't care about the people who are struggling.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: False tears bring pain to those around you. A false smile brings pain to one self.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: At times the life of a single man is worth more than that of a million, I thought that'd be common sense to a soldier.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You can't change the world without getting your hands dirty.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You see, the world will not change through naive talks.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: A life that lives without doing anything is the same as a slow death.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Why do people lie? It isn't only because they struggle against each other, it's also because there is something that they're seeking.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: When there is evil in this world that justice cannot defeat, would you taint your hands with evil to defeat evil? Or would you remain steadfast and righteous even if it means surrendering to evil?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Do you know the truth of the battlefield? Kill a man normally, and it's considered a crime. But kill many on the battlefield and you become a hero!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Death may be my only freedom.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: To desire some results, one must take actions.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Strength that knows no boundaries is merely violence.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The human heart is the source of all our power... We fight with the power of our hearts.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: A life with no changes canâ€™t be called life. You can only call it experience.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Being hurt on the outside is better than being hurt on the inside.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Our crying for them won't bring the dead back to life.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Things that don't change go extinct.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: But the mass we call "world" keeps turning, ignoring our individual desires.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The world lies! Thou shalt not commit murder, thou shalt not bear false witness, thou shalt not cheat, thou shalt not steal, thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's wife. All of these are lies! Mere illusions and nothing more! They don't want to be killed, they don't want to be robbed, using the twin lies of justice and morality, the weak are endeavoring to protect themselves. But the first truth is that the strong devour the weak, so let us feed upon people, upon wealth, upon riches and power! We, at Britannia, shall feast upon the raw flesh of the world itself! We will crush this deception and bring forth the truth! All Hail Britannia!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The trick of real combat is that everyone is human.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Shut up! I did what I had to do. People lie to survive. No one is blameless.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: In this world, evil can arise from the best of intentions. And there is good which can come from evil intentions.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Change will never come about if you don't make it happen.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Don't mistake borrowed power for your own ability!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: If strength is justice, then is powerlessness a crime?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: People don't give damn about reasons, but nobody can resist miracles.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: There are times in life when you have to distance yourself from those you love, because you love them.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I think that "truth" is something that is covered up most of the time.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: We are Partners. If you are a Witch, then I am a Warlock.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: To defeat evil, I shall become an even GREATER evil.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Lelou? I'm glad that I could talk to you in the end. You know? When I got my memories back, I was so scared... A fake teacher... Friends with no memories... Everyone was... lying to me... It was as if... the whole world was watching over me... Lelou, you've been fighting... all by yourself against this world... All by yourself... So that's why... I wanted to become the one thing truthful to you... I love you, Lelou. Even when I knew you killed my father... I couldn't... bring myself to hate you. Even when you tried to make me forget everything... I still fell... in love with you again... Even when my memories were altered... I still fell in love again... No matter how many times I'm reborn... I'm sure I'll... fall in love with you again, Lelou... This... is fate, right? So, it's okay, right, Lelou? That I fall in love with you when I'm reborn... No matter... how many times... I'll... fall in... love with you...

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: War is merely one method of diplomacy. However, it is the least efficient one.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: In their heart, everyone has faith that their victory exists. However, in the face of time and destiny, the act of faith is fruitless and fleeting at best.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Let's play this democracy game, shall we?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I shall gamble on the geass known as people wishes. For the sake of the world's future.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Don't you think wishes are the same as Geass? Things you can't accomplish with your own powers, you ask assistance from others.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: It's not over yet!... Carve into your memories "Jeremiah Gottwald", the memorable name of the man that made you taste defeat!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I am Lelouch Vi Britannia, son of the late Empress Marianne. The prince abandoned by his empire. If there are any that think they can go beyond my despair, then let them try.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: If happiness had a form, what would it look like? It might be something like glass, because one doesn't notice it normally. However, it is actually there. As proof, if you look at it from a different angle, the glass will reflect light. It will state it's presence and existence more eloquently than any other thing in this world.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: If you had the strength, you could live. This is our contract. In return for my gift of power, you must grant one of my wishes. If you enter this contract, you will live as a human, but also as one completely different. Different rules, different time, a different life.... The power of the king will make you lonely indeed. If you are prepared for that, then...

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I order you to love me!..

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I see... You're taking things awfully fast, but like they say, "to each his own". I suppose that's just how you operate---*Lelouch drops a teacup on the ground*

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Win through, Lelouch. Ignore your past, and the consequences of your actions.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: *to C.C.* It's a contract, this time coming from me to you.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You foolish impostor, who tried to take Nunnally's place, I will use you until you dry up, then throw you away like a ragged cloth!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You know what this badass mother can do so back off!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You revealed it much too fast. Such a bad sport, girl.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Fuhahahahaha, this is how you create panic.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Compete, fight, take, control. Beyond that lies the future! All Hail Britannia!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I don't want to hear that from an eternally young and immortal witch.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: From this moment on, this room shall be the very first territory of the United States of Japan!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Once you have won this war, you will need a wife someday, right? For you to have a life where you cannot reveal your identity to the world, I believe that there will be someone who can calm your soul?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The world will change. I will change it.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I would like you to answer a question before you dispose of me. If being powerless is evil, is having power justice? Is revenge Evil? Can friendship coexist with justice..?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I've made a contract with the devil, so I can't be friends with a god.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You've had only two choices ever since you joined the Order of the Black Knights. Either live with me, or die with me!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I don't know why snow is white, but I find such white snow beautiful, and I don't dislike it at all.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Lloyd-san, shall I teach you the proper way to communicate with others?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: What are you doing, C.C.? Now you're all wet. Come on, we'll have to go to the washroom. I'll get you a change of clothes.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Terrorism is nothing more than childish harassment.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: F*CK OFF!! *to Kallen while he's trying to kill Zero*

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: ...supposed to be dead? I have returned, your Majesty. In order to change EVERYTHING.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I am the 17th successor, the second in line to the throne. Lelouch Vi Britannia.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Why must I search through other people's underwear? You Owe me Big Time for this.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: *holding a hand to his face as he steps out in front of a car* I...I..I am not ORAAAAAAAAAAANGE. *falls and fails*

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I was just checking, you horny little punk.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Tss, useless terrorists!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: You are not alone. We are accomplices. If you are a witch, I will become a warlock.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Within the endless flow of time, I am alone.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: *after a giant pizza is thrown into the air**Gasp* Pizza!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Everyone who calls themselves Japanese:I have a request. Can you all die?Erm...I hoped that you would all commit suicide, but is that impossible?Then can all the soldiers please annihilate them?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: That's right, I'm Zero. The leader of the Order of Black Knight. The one who declared war on the Holy Britannia Empire. And, a guy who is about to take over the world!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Perhaps this is what I have always wished for since that day. The loss and destruction of all. That's right, one must destroy before creating. In that case, if my conscience becomes a hindrance to me, then I will simply erase it. I have no other choice but to move forward...therefore!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Since that day, I've always been living a lie. The fact that I'm alive is a lie. My name is a lie, my background is a lie. It's full of lies. Fed up with the world that does not change at all, but I can't even let everything go because of this despair called "lies". But now I have in my hands...this power, therefore!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Or have you realized it? That only those who are prepared to be shot have the right to shoot...! Lelouch Vi Britannia commands you all...to DIE!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: What's wrong? You aren't going to shoot? Your opponent's a student.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Hey, tell me, how should a Britannian who hates Britannia live?

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: That's not necessary. It's a waste of time. Let's get married.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Those with power, fear us! Those without power, seek us!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: *to Lelouch* No matter how great you make yourself sound, you're still just a naive boy who's all talk and who only dreams of victory in his head.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: *Milay describes Lelouch as a subordinate* Subordinate..? Yeah, I guess I am.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: That's easy. If someone wins, the fighting will end.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Ah, I'm sorry. Sorry! *is punched by Cecile*

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: That contradiction might kill you someday.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: O-O-O-range?! DIE !!!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Oh it has been a while. you are still in the army? But I don't have the time to deal with you, Orange-kun.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Is Zero here? If you are around, fight with me...fight with me, Jeremiah Gottwald!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Those who are allowed to shoot are those who are prepared to be shot.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I was dead until the moment I met you. I was a powerless corpse pretending to be alive. Living without power, without the ability to change my course, was akin to a slow death.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: *evil laughter* It IS possible! Britannia can be destroyed!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Lelouch vi Britannia commands you... Die!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I Destroy worlds...I Create worlds...

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Fake tears can harm others, while a fake smile only harms oneself.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: If the king doesn't move, then his subjects won't follow.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: What are the Japanese?!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Ever since that day my heart simply couldn't accept it. This fake life I was never able to fit into. All the time that was lost. These false memories planted in me giving me a life as one of the herd. And yet, the truth continues to guide me toward itself. That's right. It wasn't me who was wrong. It was the world. The world has to change so I will change it.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The only ones who should kill, are those who are prepared to be killed.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Come on! You know what this badass mother can do!

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: The world cannot be changed with pretty words alone.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: I am not the one at fault, the world is.

quotes.show: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quotes.quote: Do you know why snow is white..? Because it forgot what colour it was.
